Package com.gaminghub.app.business

Class GamesBusinessService

java.lang.Object
com.gaminghub.app.business.GamesBusinessService
All Implemented Interfaces:
GamesBusinessServiceInterface
@Service public class GamesBusinessService extends Object implements GamesBusinessServiceInterface
Service implementation for handling business logic related to games.

    • getFilteredGames

      public List<GameModel> getFilteredGames(String genre, String platform, Float maxPrice, Float minRating)
      Retrieves games filtered by genre, platform, max price, and minimum rating. Any of the filters can be null or empty to ignore that filter.
      Specified by:
      getFilteredGames in interface GamesBusinessServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      genre - The genre to filter by (case-insensitive), or null/empty to ignore
      platform - The platform to filter by (case-insensitive), or null/empty to ignore
      maxPrice - The maximum price to filter by, or null to ignore
      minRating - The minimum rating to filter by, or null to ignore
      Returns:
      List of GameModel objects matching the filter criteria

    • getGamesInRange

      public List<GameModel> getGamesInRange(int limit, int offset)
      Retrieves a subset of games within a specified range for pagination.
      Specified by:
      getGamesInRange in interface GamesBusinessServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      limit - Number of games to retrieve
      offset - Number of games to skip before retrieval
      Returns:
      List of GameModel objects within the specified range

      Returns:
